channel.title: LCallDR
channel.description: This is an interleaved feed of the most recent entries from LCallDR, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Radical Teachers Union Boss Randi Weingarten Places Blame for Hamas Hostage Murders—on Netanyahu

item.title: Matt Schlapp to Newsmax: Harris Not Authentic
item.description: CPAC chairman Matt Schlapp told Newsmax on Tuesday that Vice President Kamala Harris keeps borrowing former President Donald Trump's policy positions.

item.title: Fmr GOP Sen. Toomey: I'm Not Voting for Trump or Harris
item.description: Former Sen. Pat Toomey, R-Pa., says he will not vote for either former President Donald Trump or Vice President Kamala Harris in November's election.

item.title: The Latest Pizza Hut Promotion Is Staged in Red States, Further Exposing Bidenomics

item.description: Former New York Gov. Andrew M. Cuomo is set to testify Sept. 10 regarding orders that kept COVID-positive patients in nursing homes.
